Description.Text: General Information:You will find our easily accessible Hotel Esser in the heart of Cologne, just 300 m from the centre of the old town and the Old Market and only a few minutes from the Rhine, the fair grounds, the Deutzer Bridge and the Cologne Cathedral. Enjoy Italian cuisine in the hotel's restaurant.Location:Hotel is located 300 meters from the old town and the old market, and just a few minutes from the Rhine.Area:The hotel is nearby Museum Ludwig, Inn holff-Stollwerch Museum, Gross ST. Martin, St. Maria Inn Kapitol.Recreation:Hotel facilities include restaurant. Rooms:Guest roomâ€™s features include mini bar, telephone, wireless Lan, Cable TV, shower or bath tub & WC, hairdryer.

You will find our easily accessible Hotel Esser in the heart of Cologne, just 300 m from the centre of the old town and the Old Market and only a few minutes from the Rhine, the fair grounds, the Deutzer Bridge and the Cologne Cathedral.
